TypeSignature.Value: public interface ILeadingMarginSpanLeadingMarginSpan2 : Android.Text.Style.ILeadingMarginSpan, Android.Text.Style.IWrapTogetherSpan, IDisposable

.class public interface auto ansi abstract ILeadingMarginSpanLeadingMarginSpan2 implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Android.Text.Style.ILeadingMarginSpan, class Android.Text.Style.IParagraphStyle, class Android.Text.Style.IWrapTogetherSpan, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: An extended version of , which allows the implementor to specify the number of lines of the paragraph to which this object is attached that the "first line of paragraph" margin width will be applied to.

remarks.para: An extended version of , which allows the implementor to specify the number of lines of the paragraph to which this object is attached that the "first line of paragraph" margin width will be applied to.

There should only be one LeadingMarginSpan2 per paragraph. The leading margin line count affects all LeadingMarginSpans in the paragraph, adjusting the number of lines to which the first line margin is applied.
As with LeadingMarginSpans, LeadingMarginSpan2s should be attached from the beginning to the end of a paragraph.

Docs.summary: Returns the number of lines of the paragraph to which this object is attached that the "first line" margin will apply to.

remarks.para: Returns the number of lines of the paragraph to which this object is attached that the "first line" margin will apply to.
